description: Sanshiro`s grandfather and judo master of the local dojo. For the most part, Kennosuke is critical of Sanshiro`s PlaWrestling exploits, preferring him to practice judo and eventually succeed him as dojo master instead. However, he is also shown secretly watching many of Sanshiro`s fights and worrying about the outcome. Eventually, Sanshiro`s success and determination convince Kennosuke to let him pursue his own dreams.
name: Sugata Kennosuke
